title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 127.12 - Appeals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 127.12 - Appeals

State Regulations

Any posthearing application to review a finding or a
sanction imposed is an appeal and shall be governed by article 3-A or 12-A of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law, as appropriate, and Parts 155 and 82 of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
127.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
